intro: Psychotria subobliqua, commonly known as the "Amazonian Psychotria," is a species of flowering plant in the Rubiaceae family. It is native to the tropical regions of South America, particularly the Amazon rainforest. The plant is characterized by its dark green, glossy leaves and clusters of small, white or pale green flowers. It produces small, berry-like fruits that are typically red when mature. Psychotria subobliqua is often found in moist, shaded environments and plays a role in the ecological dynamics of its habitat.
